en.title: **Bachelor** in Data Science and Business Analytics
en.info: The University of Danang - University of Economics
en.text: Completed the Bachelor's program in Data Science and Business Analytics at the University of Economics, Da Nang, with a curriculum focused on business operations, data analysis, data mining, machine learning, AI, and advanced tools. Graduated as the top student in the faculty with a GPA of 3.7, along with a high-achieving research thesis and first prize in scientific research.

en.title: Data Scientist Training Program **(Short-Term)** at enterprise
en.text: Developed a combined forecasting model to detect signals in transaction flows, aimed at optimizing trading strategies. Additionally, contributed to reports on momentum/reversal analysis in business performance and reports on the relationships between stocks within groups categorized by Vnindex trends.
